name: Sugi: On A Roll
description:
In this charming 2D platformer, you play as Sugi; our ceramic friend who’s body may have gotten just a bit a-head of itself. Based on the Japanese art of pottery repair known as “kintsugi”, your goal is to repair Sugi as they navigate through each unique and increasingly-difficult level. Run, ramp, and jump (w, a, s, d, and space bar) to roll around in the gold glue, and get your body back. Can you beat all the levels and make our hero whole again? 

Made for AIE USA’s Virtual Game Jam 2021. 

Theme: Broken but Beautful 

Time: 46 hours 

Software used: 

Unity 

Visual Studio Code
